title: Superman & Rick and Morty Come to Fortnite - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.08.21
description:
Blessing and Whitta talk about Fortnite's latest season, Ratchet and Clank Rift Apart reviews, and Capcom's E3 plans.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:00 - Housekeeping
It’s E3 WEEK; CAN YOU BELIEVE IT?! The general idea is that we’re reacting to ALMOST everything. So if it’s happening, check out twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Thursday, it starts with Summer Games Fest Kickoff at 11 am PT.
This means that all your favorite shows are getting jumbled and happening around E3, so stay tuned.
Speaking of your favorite shows -- The Kinda Funny Gamescast is bringing you the Ratchet and Clank: Rift Apart review! PSILY records this afternoon as an FAQ.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:12:39 - Rick from Rick and Morty is coming to Fortnite season 7! (along with Superman) - Austen Goslin @ Polygon
00:23:36 - Ratchet and Clank Review Round-Up
00:37:48 - Capcom has announced their E3 showcase - Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
00:47:15 - Bandai Namco denies it’s bringing Scarlet Nexus to Xbox Game Pass - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:49:50 - PlayDate looks really cool! - Sam Byford @ The Verge
00:59:15 - Out today
00:34:45 - Ad
01:01:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Tim
